conversation.content: Flink 1.17 Springboot 打包

要将Flink 1.17与Spring Boot应用程序一起打包，您需要使用插件和配置文件来将它们放在一起。

首先，在您的Spring Boot应用程序中添加以下插件：

```xml
<build>
   <plugins>
      <plugin>
         <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
         <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
         <version>2.5.3</version>
         <executions>
            <execution>
               <goals>
                  <goal>repackage</goal>
               </goals>
            </execution>
         </executions>
      </plugin>
   </plugins>
</build>
```

这将自动将Spring Boot应用程序打包成可运行的jar文件。

接下来，在您的Flink项目中，将以下内容添加到pom.xml文件的<build>部分：

```xml
<build>
   <plugins>
      <plugin>
         <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
         <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
         <version>3.3.0</version>
         <executions>
            <execution>
               <id>assemble</id>
               <phase>package</phase>
               <goals>
                  <goal>single</goal>
               </goals>
               <configuration>
                  <archive>
                     <manifest>
                        <mainClass>您的SpringBoot主类</mainClass>
                     </manifest>
                  </archive>
               </configuration>
            </execution>
         </executions>
      </plugin>
   </plugins>
</build>
```

最后，运行mvn clean package命令来构建Flink项目和Spring Boot应用程序的jar文件。将在目标文件夹中找到两个文件：您的Spring Boot应用程序的可运行jar文件和Flink项目的jar文件。

您可以按以下顺序运行jar文件：

1. 运行Spring Boot应用程序的可运行jar文件
2. 在应用程序中运行Flink项目的jar文件：通过这种方式，您可以将Flink作为一个库运行，并从Spring Boot应用程序中访问它。

例如，您可以将以下命令添加到运行时脚本中：

java -jar 您的SpringBoot可运行jar文件
java -cp 您的Flink项目的jar文件 com.example.YourFlinkProgram
Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-assembly-plugin:3.3.0:single (assemble) on project ihs-flink-cdc: Error reading assemblies: No assembly descriptors found.

这个错误通常表示maven-assembly-plugin没有找到配置文件。您需要在项目中添加一个assembly.xml文件，该文件描述如何构建jar包。

在您的Flink项目的根目录中创建一个名为“assembly.xml”的文件，然后将以下示例内容添加到文件中：

```xml
<assembly xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-assembly-plugin/assembly/1.1.2"
    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-assembly-plugin/assembly/1.1.2
                        http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-assembly-plugin/schema/1.1.2/maven-assembly-plugin-1.1.2.xsd">
    <id>distribution</id>
    <formats>
        <format>jar</format>
    </formats>
    <includeBaseDirectory>false</includeBaseDirectory>
    <fileSets>
        <fileSet>
            <directory>${project.build.outputDirectory}</directory>
            <outputDirectory>/</outputDirectory>
            <includes>
                <include>*.class</include>
            </includes>
        </fileSet>
        <fileSet>
            <directory>${project.basedir}</directory>
            <outputDirectory>/</outputDirectory>
            <includes>
                <include>README.*</include>
            </includes>
        </fileSet>
    </fileSets>
    <dependencySets>
        <dependencySet>
            <useProjectArtifact>true</useProjectArtifact>
            <outputDirectory>/lib</outputDirectory>
            <excludes>
                <exclude>junit:junit</exclude>
            </excludes>
        </dependencySet>
    </dependencySets>
    <repositories>
        <repository>
            <id>mvn-repo</id>
            <url>http://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2</url>
        </repository>
    </repositories>
</assembly>
```

然后，在您的Flink项目中的pom.xml中添加以下配置：

```xml
<build>
    <plugins> 
        <plugin>
            <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>3.3.0</version>
            <executions>
                <execution>
                    <id>assemble</id>
                    <phase>package</phase>
                    <goals>
                        <goal>single</goal>
                    </goals>
                </execution>
            </executions>
            <configuration>
                <descriptors>
                    <descriptor>assembly.xml</descriptor>
                </descriptors>
                <archive>
                    <manifest>
                        <mainClass>com.example.YourSpringBootApplication</mainClass>
                    </manifest>
                </archive>
            </configuration>
        </plugin>
    </plugins>
</build>
```

这将告诉maven-assembly-plugin查找名为“assembly.xml”的配置文件并使用它来构建jar包。请确保将“com.example.YourSpringBootApplication”替换为您的Spring Boot应用程序的主类路径。

现在，您可以运行`mvn clean package`来构建带有Flink和Spring Boot的可运行jar包。
Flink 1.17 Springboot 打包

要将Flink 1.17与Spring Boot应用程序一起打包，您可以使用Maven插件和配置文件将它们放在一起。

首先，在您的Spring Boot应用程序中添加以下插件：

```xml
<build>
   <plugins>
      <plugin>
         <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
         <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
         <version>2.5.3</version>
         <executions>
            <execution>
               <goals>
                  <goal>repackage</goal>
               </goals>
            </execution>
         </executions>
      </plugin>
   </plugins>
</build>
```

这将自动将Spring Boot应用程序打包成可运行的jar文件。

接下来，在您的Flink项目中，将以下内容添加到pom.xml文件的<build>部分：

```xml
<build>
   <plugins>
      <plugin>
         <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
         <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
         <version>3.3.0</version>
         <executions>
            <execution>
               <id>assemble</id>
               <phase>package</phase>
               <goals>
                  <goal>single</goal>
               </goals>
               <configuration>
                  <archive>
                     <manifest>
                        <mainClass>您的SpringBoot主类</mainClass>
                     </manifest>
                  </archive>
                  <descriptorRefs>
                     <descriptorRef>jar-with-dependencies</descriptorRef>
                  </descriptorRefs>
               </configuration>
            </execution>
         </executions>
      </plugin>
   </plugins>
</build>
```

现在，运行mvn clean package命令来构建Flink项目和Spring Boot应用程序的可运行jar文件。将在目标文件夹中找到一个包含Flink和所有依赖项的jar文件和一个仅包含Spring Boot应用程序的可运行jar文件。

您可以按以下顺序运行这两个文件：

1. 运行Flink项目的jar文件：通过这种方式，您可以将Flink作为一个库运行，并从Spring Boot应用程序中访问它。

   ```
   java -cp 您的Flink项目的jar文件 com.example.YourFlinkProgram
   ```

2. 运行Spring Boot应用程序的可运行jar文件

   ```
   java -jar 您的SpringBoot可运行jar文件
   ```

请确保将“com.example.YourFlinkProgram”和“您的SpringBoot主类”替换为您的实际类路径。

conversation.content: Flink 1.17 Springboot 打包

Flink 1.17是一个流处理引擎，Spring Boot是一个快速开发应用程序的框架。若要将Flink 1.17和Spring Boot结合起来使用，需要进行以下步骤来打包：

1. 首先在pom.xml文件中添加Flink和Spring Boot的依赖，以及任何其他的需要的依赖。

2. 创建一个Spring Boot启动类，用于启动Spring应用程序。这个类应该包含一个main()方法，并使用@SpringBootApplication注解进行标注。在这个类中可以创建Flink的ExecutionEnvironment，并使用Flink的DataStream API来执行数据流处理操作。

3. 将整个应用程序打包成一个可执行的jar文件。这可以通过在pom.xml文件中使用maven-assembly-plugin或maven-shade-plugin来完成。这些插件可以将所有依赖和资源打包到一个jar文件中。

4. 启动应用程序。

以下是一个示例pom.xml文件和Spring Boot启动类，用于将Flink和Spring Boot结合起来使用：

```xml
<!-- pom.xml -->
<dependencies>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.flink</groupId>
    <artifactId>flink-java</artifactId>
    <version>1.17.0</version>
  </dependency>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-boot-starter</artifactId>
    <version>2.5.5</version>
  </dependency>
  ...
</dependencies>

...

<!-- maven-assembly-plugin -->
<build>
  <plugins>
    <plugin>
      <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
      <version>3.3.0</version>
      <configuration>
        <archive>
          <manifest>
            <mainClass>com.example.MyApplication</mainClass>
          </manifest>
        </archive>
        <descriptorRefs>
          <descriptorRef>jar-with-dependencies</descriptorRef>
        </descriptorRefs>
      </configuration>
      <executions>
        <execution>
          <id>make-assembly</id>
          <phase>package</phase>
          <goals>
            <goal>single</goal>
          </goals>
        </execution>
      </executions>
    </plugin>
  </plugins>
</build>
```

```java
// MyApplication.java
@SpringBootApplication
public class MyApplication {
  public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
    SpringApplication.run(MyApplication.class, args);

    final StreamExecutionEnvironment env = StreamExecutionEnvironment.getExecutionEnvironment();

    DataStream<Tuple2<String, Integer>> dataStream = env.fromElements(
      new Tuple2<>("foo", 1),
      new Tuple2<>("bar", 2)
    );

    dataStream.print();

    env.execute("My Flink job");
  }
}
```

要打包应用程序，可以通过运行以下maven命令完成：

```
mvn clean package
```

最终生成的可执行jar文件将包含所有的依赖和资源，并可以通过以下命令来启动应用程序：

```
java -jar my-application.jar
```
Flink 集群  springboot 打包

在 Flink 集群中部署 springboot 应用，可以采用以下步骤进行打包：

1. 首先，将你的 Spring Boot 应用打成一个可执行的 jar 包，可以使用 maven-shade-plugin 插件来完成此操作。在 pom.xml 中添加以下依赖和插件配置：

```xml
<!-- pom.xml -->
<dependencies>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-boot-starter</artifactId>
    <version>2.5.5</version>
  </dependency>
  ...
</dependencies>

...

<!-- maven-shade-plugin -->
<build>
  <plugins>
    <plugin>
      <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
      <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
      <version>3.2.4</version>
      <configuration>
        <filters>
          <filter>
            <artifact>*:*</artifact>
            <excludes>
              <exclude>META-INF/*.SF</exclude>
              <exclude>META-INF/*.DSA</exclude>
              <exclude>META-INF/*.RSA</exclude>
            </excludes>
          </filter>
        </filters>
        <transformers>
          <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ManifestResourceTransformer">
            <mainClass>com.example.Application</mainClass>
          </transformer>
        </transformers>
      </configuration>
      <executions>
        <execution>
          <phase>package</phase>
          <goals>
            <goal>shade</goal>
          </goals>
        </execution>
      </executions>
    </plugin>
  </plugins>
</build>
```

其中 `com.example.Application` 是你的 Spring Boot 应用程序的主类，替换为你自己的主类。

2. 然后，将打包好的 Spring Boot 应用程序放到 Flink 集群的某个节点上。

3. 修改 Flink 集群的配置文件 flink-conf.yaml，增加以下配置项：

```
jobmanager.rpc.address: <job manager 的地址>
rest.port: <rest 端口号>
```

其中，`<job manager 的地址>` 是 Flink 集群中 job manager 进程的地址，可以是 IP 地址或者主机名，`<rest 端口号>` 是 Flink rest 服务监听的端口号，可以任意指定一个未被占用的端口号。

4. 确保 Flink 集群的 flink-runtime-web_2.12.jar 包已在 lib 目录下，该包为 Flink rest 服务的依赖包。如果没有该包，则需要将 Flink 安装包的 opt 文件夹下的 flink-runtime-web_2.12.jar 复制到 Flink 集群的 lib 目录下。

5. 接下来，启动 Flink 集群。可以使用以下命令：

```
./bin/start-cluster.sh
```

6. 等待 Flink 集群启动完成之后，可通过以下命令提交 Spring Boot 应用程序：

```
./bin/flink run -c com.example.Application /path/to/your/application.jar
```

其中，`com.example.Application` 是你的 Spring Boot 应用的主类，`/path/to/your/application.jar` 是你打包好的可执行 jar 包的路径。

7. 提交应用之后，可以在 Flink web 界面或者通过以下命令查看应用的状态：

```
./bin/flink list -r
```

如果应用提交成功，则可以在 Flink 集群上运行该应用程序了。注意，在对应用程序进行修改后，需要重新打包并提交应用才能生效。

maven-shade-plugin has detected that some class files are
present in two or more JARs. When this happens, only one
single version of the class is copied to the uber jar.

该问题通常是由于项目依赖中存在相同类名的依赖包，在将多个依赖包打包到一个 jar 包中时，会出现冲突。

maven-shade-plugin 通过类重定向机制来解决这个问题，即为冲突的类分配一个新的包名，然后在打包过程中将不同的类包名合并成一个包名，确保最终打包的 jar 包中只包含一个版本的类。

可以在 maven-shade-plugin 的配置中添加以下配置来忽略某些包或者类的合并：

```xml
<!-- pom.xml -->
<plugins>
  <plugin>
    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>3.2.4</version>
    <configuration>
      <artifactSet>
        <excludes>
          <exclude>commons-beanutils:commons-beanutils</exclude>
          <exclude>commons-collections:commons-collections</exclude>
          <exclude>commons-io:commons-io</exclude>
          <exclude>org.codehaus.jackson:jackson-core-asl</exclude>
          <exclude>org.codehaus.jackson:jackson-mapper-asl</exclude>
        </excludes>
      </artifactSet>
      <filters>
        <filter>
          <artifact>*:*</artifact>
          <excludes>
            <exclude>META-INF/*.SF</exclude>
            <exclude>META-INF/*.DSA</exclude>
            <exclude>META-INF/*.RSA</exclude>
          </excludes>
        </filter>
      </filters>
      <transformers>
        <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ManifestResourceTransformer">
          <mainClass>com.example.Application</mainClass>
        </transformer>
        <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ServicesResourceTransformer"/>
      </transformers>
    </configuration>
  </plugin>
</plugins>
```

在配置文件中忽略了一些常见的包，例如 commons-beanutils，commons-collections，commons-io，org.codehaus.jackson 等。在实际使用时，需要根据具体情况自行指定忽略的包和类。

还可以使用 maven-dependency-plugin 来查看项目依赖中是否存在重复的类，例如：

```xml
<!-- pom.xml -->
<plugins>
  <plugin>
    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-dependency-plugin</artifactId>
    <executions>
      <execution>
        <id>tree</id>
        <goals>
          <goal>tree</goal>
        </goals>
        <phase>compile</phase>
        <configuration>
          <verbose>true</verbose>
          <includes>commons-collections:commons-collections</includes>
        </configuration>
      </execution>
    </executions>
  </plugin>
</plugins>
```

该命令会输出项目依赖树中包含 commons-collections:commons-collections 的依赖。可以使用类似的方式来检查其他依赖是否存在类冲突的情况。

conversation.content: Invocation of close method failed on bean with name 'dataSource': java.lang.LinkageError: loader constraint violation: loader 'app' wants to load class com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidConnectionHolder

This error typically occurs when there is a conflict between different versions of a library or when a library is being loaded by different class loaders. In this case, it seems that the application is trying to load "com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidConnectionHolder" from two different sources.

To resolve this error, you should ensure that there is only one version of the library in the classpath and that all dependencies are using the same version. You can also try adjusting the class loading configuration to avoid conflicts between different class loaders.
flink1.17 maven-shade-plugin

The Maven Shade plugin allows you to create a single executable jar file that includes all of the dependencies of your application. This can be very useful for deploying Flink applications, as you can easily distribute a single jar file that contains all of your code and the necessary Flink libraries.

To use the Maven Shade plugin with Flink 1.17, you need to add the following configuration to your pom.xml file:

```
<build>
  <plugins>
    <plugin>
      <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
      <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
      <version>3.2.4</version>
      <executions>
        <execution>
          <phase>package</phase>
          <goals>
            <goal>shade</goal>
          </goals>
        </execution>
      </executions>
      <configuration>
        <createDependencyReducedPom>false</createDependencyReducedPom>
        <filters>
          <filter>
            <artifact>*:*</artifact>
            <excludes>
              <exclude>META-INF/*.SF</exclude>
              <exclude>META-INF/*.DSA</exclude>
              <exclude>META-INF/*.RSA</exclude>
            </excludes>
          </filter>
        </filters>
        <transformers>
          <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ManifestResourceTransformer">
            <mainClass>com.yourcompany.yourapp.MainClass</mainClass>
          </transformer>
        </transformers>
      </configuration>
    </plugin>
  </plugins>
</build>
```

This configuration sets up the Maven Shade plugin to run during the package phase of the build and creates a shaded jar file that includes all of the dependencies of your application.

The `createDependencyReducedPom` property is set to `false` to prevent the plugin from generating a new pom.xml file that only includes the shaded dependencies.

The `filters` configuration excludes certain files from being included in the shaded jar file. In this case, the META-INF/*.SF, META-INF/*.DSA, and META-INF/*.RSA files are excluded.

Finally, the `transformers` configuration tells the Maven Shade plugin to add a Main-Class entry to the manifest file of the shaded jar file. You should replace "com.yourcompany.yourapp.MainClass" with the name of your application's main class.

Once you've added this configuration to your pom.xml file, you can create a shaded jar file by running the following command:

```
mvn package
```

This will create a shaded jar file in the target directory of your project. You can then use this jar file to run your Flink application.
Flink springboot maven-shade-plugin打包

To package a Flink Spring Boot application using the Maven Shade plugin, you can add the following configuration to your pom.xml file.

```
<build>
  <plugins>
    <plugin>
      <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
      <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
      <version>3.2.4</version>
      <executions>
        <execution>
          <id>shade-my-app</id>
          <phase>package</phase>
          <goals>
            <goal>shade</goal>
          </goals>
          <configuration>
            <filters>
              <filter>
                <artifact>*:*</artifact>
                <excludes>
                  <exclude>META-INF/*.SF</exclude>
                  <exclude>META-INF/*.DSA</exclude>
                  <exclude>META-INF/*.RSA</exclude>
                </excludes>
              </filter>
            </filters>
            <transformers>
              <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ManifestResourceTransformer">
                <mainClass>com.example.MainClass</mainClass>
              </transformer>
              <transformer implementation="org.springframework.boot.maven.PropertiesMergingResourceTransformer">
                <resource>application.properties</resource>
              </transformer>
              <transformer implementation="org.springframework.boot.maven.PropertiesMergingResourceTransformer">
                <resource>application.yaml</resource>
              </transformer>
            </transformers>
          </configuration>
        </execution>
      </executions>
    </plugin>
  </plugins>
</build>
```

This configuration includes the Maven Shade plugin in the build process, sets it to execute during the `package` phase, and uses it to create a shaded jar file that contains all the dependencies of your application.

In the `filters` element, you can add exclusions of files that should not be included in the shaded jar. The configuration in this example excludes the signature files.

In the `transformers` element, you can add transformer elements to specify how to transform certain resources. In this example, there are transformers to specify the main class of the application and to merge the application.properties and application.yaml files.

When you run the `mvn package` command, the Maven Shade plugin will create the shaded jar file that contains all the necessary dependencies of your Flink Spring Boot application, ready to be deployed.
